title: Email Forwarding
shortDescription: Forward mail for your domain to your current email address
longDescription:
**üì• All emails sent to mail@yourdomain.com will be forwarded to the email you use for Cloudflare.**

**You do not need email hosting for your domain, you will receive emails to your main address.**

**Example: mail@yourdomain.com ‚è© yourmail@gmail.com**

**üîí We don't save your emails.**
author: EForw.com

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

help.helpvalue:
üì• All emails sent to your domain (to any addess) will be forwarded to the email you use for Cloudflare.

info@yoursite.com ‚è© yourmail@gmail.com
help@yoursite.com ‚è© yourmail@gmail.com
mail@yoursite.com ‚è© yourmail@gmail.com
... and any other.

üîí We don't save your emails.

failure.message: There was an error communicating with Email Forwarding.
